title: Checking If User is Logged In
description: How to check if a user is logged in using their session.
content: To protect pages, you need to check if a user is logged in. This usually means checking if their session contains a user ID or similar info.

flask.code: if 'user_id' in session: # user is logged in

django.code: if request.session.get('user_id'): # user is logged in
